name: 101 Pinball World
description:
Get ready for fast-paced pinball action with a twist! Complete special objectives to earn fun bonuses as you shoot your ball through pipes, up ramps and around mind-blowing obstacles. Choose from two game modes, Quick Play and Random, and blast through over 100 fun tables on four exciting worlds filled with eye-popping details. Be a pinball wiz in Wizard World, go on a galactic adventure in Alien Spaceship, enjoy a spooky trip through Halloween and become a buccaneer in Pirate's Bay. Rack up enough points to top the High Scores and you'll be the pinball champ!

Features:
• 101 amazing tables in four unique worlds
• Three player profiles and High Scores list
• Classic pinball gameplay enhanced with beautiful graphics
• Multiple special objectives earn extra points and power-ups
• Fun bonuses include table tilt, slow ball, and immunity
